prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Clifford Dowdey, Accession #3809-e, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was gifted to the university on 22 May 1970.
